law.catch_line: Report on use of energy-efficiency measures in state government -- Contents.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 8, effective February 25, 2010. -- Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 8, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 2007 (2d Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 33, effective August 30, 2007. -- Amended 1997 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, secs. 34 and 43, effective May 30, 1997. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 223, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1996.

metadata.lrc-note: (2/25/2010). 2010 Ky. Acts. ch. 5, sec. 28, provides that the repeal and reenactment of this section in that Act "shall apply retroactively to July 15, 2008."
